document.topic_text: They all sponsor a partisan pitch. Of law-maker control Leaving a stagnant wage-earner niche. Each party has had its convention, With active internal contention. Makes a vote hard to choose It’s tough not to yield to abstention. The congestion in Wilmington’s tough. It’s as if the streets aren’t wide enough. Increased populations
